column4: hi, i'm having trouble importing mp4 files in shotwell. It causes shotwell to freeze. Is this a known problem? Maybe with a fix
fspot has mono dependencies
:P
what about tags
digikam
yeah, digikam is awesome, but it's a little TOO packed with features for my needs, and besides i'd like a gnome application
I havent found a single gnome application fitting my needs - I dont use all that digikam features, but only the ones I want/need.
You dont have to install KDE for using digikam. Install digikam only.
And since there is no sane, comparable solution like digikam in gnome - thats the best choice then.
you had any problems importing mp4 files?

maybe you're right, it just bugs me to download 131 MB of packages, which most are shared libs not used for anything else.. Installed size is 522 Mb.. Shotwell is what, 2 MB download and maybe 10 installed..
Do you have a very smal hard disk? Like 1GB? hard disk space is about 20 cents per gigabyte currently.
yeah i have a 256Gig ssd. :P Also i'm currently online using gprs at roughly 7kB/s.. So 131 Mb is alot.. :P
The harddisk is about... 2000 times larger than what you want to download. The only reason _could_ be yourdownload speed. And still, digikam would be worth it.
I never used shotwell, and sI had no problems using digikam so far.
okay
Wrong approach.
And never had a working system, either. But thats OT in here.
